column3: $Managers: Red Schoendienst (NL St. Louis) and Mayo Smith (AL Detroit); First All-Star Game postponement; game originally scheduled for July 22; field still wet and skies threatening when played; VP Spipro Agnew threw out first pitch, because President Richard Nixon left to watch Apollo 11 splashdown in the Pacific; Records set: 13 straight games at 3rd for B Robinson, 14 appearances for winning side by Willie Mays, and a 7-year errorless streak for the NL; MVP: Willie McCovey (San Francisco NL)FILENAME_TX"
$home run in first All-Star at bat1969AS.EVE.asg.comment.csv"
